argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | plydiv.pl | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) ) -> ( x + y ) e. S ) |
| 2 |  | plydiv.tm | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) ) -> ( x x. y ) e. S ) |
| 3 |  | plydiv.rc | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ x =/= 0 ) ) -> ( 1 / x ) e. S ) |
| 4 |  | plydiv.m1 | |- ( ph -> -u 1 e. S ) |
| 5 |  | plydiv.f | |- ( ph -> F e. ( Poly ` S ) ) |
| 6 |  | plydiv.g | |- ( ph -> G e. ( Poly ` S ) ) |
| 7 |  | plydiv.z | |- ( ph -> G =/= 0p ) |
| 8 |  | plydiv.r | |- R = ( F oF - ( G oF x. q ) ) |
| 9 | 5 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ q e. ( Poly ` S ) ) -> F e. ( Poly ` S ) ) |
| 10 | 6 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ q e. ( Poly ` S ) ) -> G e. ( Poly ` S ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( ph /\ q e. ( Poly ` S ) ) -> q e. ( Poly ` S ) ) |
| 12 | 1 | #P_adantlr | |- ( ( ( ph /\ q e. ( Poly ` S ) ) /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) ) -> ( x + y ) e. S ) |
| 13 | 2 | #P_adantlr | |- ( ( ( ph /\ q e. ( Poly ` S ) ) /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) ) -> ( x x. y ) e. S ) |
| 14 | 10, 11, 12, 13 | #P_plymul | |- ( ( ph /\ q e. ( Poly ` S ) ) -> ( G oF x. q ) e. ( Poly ` S ) ) |
| 15 | 4 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ q e. ( Poly ` S ) ) -> -u 1 e. S ) |
| 16 | 9, 14, 12, 13, 15 | #P_plysub | |- ( ( ph /\ q e. ( Poly ` S ) ) -> ( F oF - ( G oF x. q ) ) e. ( Poly ` S ) ) |
| 17 | 8, 16 | #P_syl5eqel | |- ( ( ph /\ q e. ( Poly ` S ) ) -> R e. ( Poly ` S ) ) |
